scripts.build:dev: wp-scripts build --config webpack.config.js && wp-scripts build --config ./node_modules/@wordpress/scripts/config/webpack.config.js --webpack-src-dir=./assets/src/blocks/ --output-path=./assets/build/blocks/ && npm run build-blocks-manifest
scripts.lint:php: if [ -d vendor ]; then vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=WordPress-VIP; else echo 'PHP CodeSniffer not installed - run composer install'; fi
scripts.phpcs:report: if [ -d vendor ]; then vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=WordPress-VIP --report=summary; else echo 'PHP CodeSniffer not installed - run composer install'; fi
scripts.phpcs:fix: if [ -d vendor ]; then vendor/bin/phpcbf --standard=WordPress-VIP; else echo 'PHP CodeSniffer not installed - run composer install'; fi
scripts.test:php: if [ -d vendor ]; then vendor/bin/phpunit; else echo 'PHPUnit not installed - run composer install'; fi
scripts.validate:vip: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run test:vip-compliance
